value.stringValue: Create O365 Account and set default password. Don't check to update password Add to Teams: Team_All The_Prosciety Team_Diveristy, Equity, and Inclusion Add to Security Groups: MFA Bypass Group Azure Onboarding Group Add to appropriate DG's. Add to Azure Portal SSO Group if necessary. USE TEMPLATE: Created O35 account. Email is INSERT EMAIL. Initial password is INSERT PASSWORD Security Groups: Azure Onboarding, MFA Bypass, New computer Software, Revoke Amin Teams Groups: Team_All, The_Prosciety, Team_Diversity, Equity and Inclusion DG Groups: INSERT DG/s
Create O365 Account and Assign License
